main event: A witness observed a balloon-shaped object with a slight trail of light glowing in the center on 9 January 1962.
interesting points: The object was seen rising through the edge of the clouds.,The observation lasted for approximately 1 minute.,The movement of the object was described as steady but rather jerky., The sighting occurred in Santurce, Puerto Rico., There were no photographs taken of the event.
sighted object: balloon-shaped object with a light trail
witness description: the observation was made through the edge of clouds
